document_data.name: ''Guardian Orb''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Guardian orbs''''', were [[wizard]]ly orb implements that boosted the wielder's abilities, popularized in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: Those mages who touched a ''guardian orb'' had their mental prowess boosted by the item's magics and they felt their resolve and defenses steeling.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''guardian orbs'' could be found among bandit spellcasters of the [[Sword Mountains]] and [[the Crags]], areas surrounding the city, markets of [[Neverwinter]], wielded by servants of the [[vampire lord]] [[Ozit]] who laired in the ruins of [[Illefarn]].
